4 Tanda Anda Jatuh Cinta pada Sahabat, Apa yang Harus Dilakukan?
05 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Tempo.co, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Keanu Reeves terlihat menggandeng mesra sahabatnya, Alexandra Grant, saat menghadiri LACMA Art + Film Gala yang digelar Gucci di Los Angeles, Amerika Serikat, Sabtu, 2 November 2019. Penampilan keduanya menimbulkan banyak spekulasi tentang hubungan mereka. Benarkah dua sahabat lama ini saling jatuh cinta?
Seperti Keanu Reeves dan Alexandra Grant, jatuh cinta pada sahabat lama sering terjadi. Sebab, kadang-kadang teman baik membuat nyaman karena lebih mengenal Anda apa adanya. Anda tidak perlu khawatir terlihat tanpa cacat saat berada di sekitar mereka, dan bisa menjadi yang paling memalukan tanpa takut mereka akan meninggalkan Anda.
Namun, segalanya berubah ketika Anda mulai melewati batas persahabatan. Anda menginginkan mereka lebih dari saat ini, tapi sekaligus takut kehilangan ketika mengungkapkannya.
Dilansir dari Elite Daily, ilmuwan perilaku Clarissa Silva dan pakar hubungan Susan Winter mengungkap beberapa tanda bahwa Anda jatuh cinta pada sahabat sendiri.
1. Ingin memberi tahu kegiatan Anda setiap saat
Apakah Anda ingin memberi tahu setiap aktivitas yang dilakukan? Menurut Silva, jika hal itu terjadi, itu artinya Anda mulai mengalihkan pikiran ke dia. "Mereka adalah mitra 'ideal' Anda karena Anda sudah tahu mereka akan melengkapi tujuan dan keinginan Anda dan membantu dalam memenuhi impian Anda," katanya.
Anda mengenal mereka dan merasa nyaman dengan mereka, sehingga terasa alami bahwa mereka akan menjadi orang nomor satu Anda.
2. Cemburu
Diam-diam, Anda mulai memperhatikan kehidupan cinta sahabat. Jika ada yang sedang dekat dengannya, Anda pun mulai diserang rasa cemburu. "Meskipun Anda tidak ingin menganggap sebagai tipe pencemburu, Anda takut peran yang penting dalam hidup mereka akan digantikan,” kata Susan.
Ini mungkin peringatan bahwa Anda berharap sahabat Anda akan memikirkan Anda dengan cara yang romantis.
3. Mulai membandingkan dia dengan pacar
Anda mulai malas bertemu dengan pacar, sebaliknya Anda lebih suka bergaul dengan sahabat. Anda juga mulai membanding-bandingkan dan merasa sahabat Anda jauh lebih baik dari pacar, lalu mulai senang curhat tentang hubungan Anda. Apakah Anda benar-benar senang curhat atau ada keinginan lebih?
4. Ingin selalu dekat mereka
Silva menjelaskan bahwa proses kimiawi di otak dapat berubah ketika Anda jatuh cinta dengan seseorang. "Tubuh Anda melepaskan adrenalin, dopamin, dan serotonin, selain testosteron dan estrogen. Ketika jatuh cinta, tubuh Anda lebih cepat memproses semuanya. Intensitas reaksi ini sangat gembira dan membuat Anda 'kecanduan' dengan teman terbaik Anda,” kata dia.
Jadi, waspada jika Anda mulai selalu ingin berada di sekitar sahabat. Tubuh Anda mungkin memberi tahu Anda, "Hei, aku sedang jatuh cinta!"
Jika Anda merasakan salah satu dari empat tanda itu, Winter menyarankan Anda berpikir objektif, menjadikan mereka sebagai sahabat atau kekasih? Jika ingin melangkah sebagai kekasih, pastikan Anda benar-benar tertarik pada mereka secara romantis dan tidak jatuh cinta pada mereka karena mereka nyaman.
Jika sahabat menunjukkan tanda-tanda jatuh cinta yang sama, Anda dapat memulai pembicaraan transisi dari persahabatan ke hubungan asmara. Tapi jika ragu, pembicaraan tentang hal itu justru bisa merusak hubungan Anda.

4 Signs You Are In Love with Friends, What Can You Do?
05 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Tempo.co, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Keanu Reeves is seen holding a close friendship, Alexandra Grant, while attending the LACMA Art + Gala film that was held by Gucci in Los Angeles, United States, Saturday, November 2, 2019. Both appearances caused a lot of speculation about their relationship. Is it true that these two old friends fell in love?
Like Keanu Reeves and Alexandra Grant, falling in love with old friends often happens. Because sometimes good friends make you comfortable because they know you better. You don't have to worry about being seen flawlessly around them, and can be the most embarrassing without fearing they will leave you.
However, everything changes when you start to cross the boundaries of friendship. You want them more than they are right now, but at the same time are afraid of losing them when you express them.
Reporting from Elite Daily, behavioral scientist Clarissa Silva and relationship expert Susan Winter revealed several signs that you are in love with your best friend.
1. Want to let you know your activities at any time
Do you want to notify every activity carried out? According to Silva, if that happens, it means you are starting to turn your mind to him. "They are your 'ideal' partner because you already know they will complete your goals and desires and help fulfill your dreams," he said.
You know them and feel comfortable with them, so it feels natural that they will be your number one person.
2. Jealousy
Secretly, you begin to pay attention to your best friend's love life. If anyone is close to him, you begin to be attacked by jealousy. "Even though you don't want to be considered a jealous type, you are afraid that an important role in their lives will be replaced," Susan said.
This might be a warning that you hope your best friend will think of you in a romantic way.
3. Start comparing him with a girlfriend
You begin to be lazy to meet a boyfriend, instead you prefer to hang out with friends. You also start comparing and feel that your best friend is much better than your boyfriend, then you start to be happy to talk about your relationship. Are you really happy to vent or are there more desires?
4. Always want to be near them
Silva explained that chemical processes in the brain can change when you fall in love with someone. "Your body releases adrenaline, dopamine and serotonin, in addition to testosterone and estrogen. When you fall in love, your body processes everything faster. The intensity of this reaction is very excited and makes you 'addicted' to your best friend," he said.
So, be alert if you start always wanting to be around friends. Your body might tell you, "Hey, I'm in love!"
If you feel one of the four signs, Winter suggests you think objectively, make them friends or lovers? If you want to go as a lover, make sure you are genuinely interested in them romantically and don't fall in love with them because they are comfortable.
If your friends show the same signs of falling in love, you can start a conversation transition from friendship to a love affair. But if in doubt, talking about it can actually damage your relationship.
